name: ${mod_name}
author: DDC forked from Tycho Bellers (original author)
description:
Use your Airbuds (support Spotify, Apple Music, SoundCloud, Deezer, Amazon Music, Audiomack) listening history to quickly search BeatSaver maps!
For better Japanese search results, install the 'Airbuds Search Kakasi' mod.
Forked from Tycho Bellers' original Spotify Search.
